docs.text: About This is the Data Commons of the NIDDK IBD Genetics Consortium - a platform to serve the storage, management, use, and sharing of research data products for the IBD community. Data Access Data Interaction This platform consists of several dynamic tools to interact with and manipulate hosted date in-place. After achieving the appropriate access, any dataset hosted in the Commons is visible on the Exploration tab and available for query using the Notebook Browser or Workspace tools. Restricted Data Much of the IBDGC Data Commons content adheres to IRB and use restrictions that vary across contributing institutions. As a result, a large portion of our datasets require completion of use agreement to gain access. Details on a case-by-case basis can be found on the Study Viewer tab or by contacting us at EMAIL@EMAIl.EDU. Data that is otherwise not access restricted will be accessible at any of the above tools without login.
